typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Cliente ID} as string,
		Nombre as string,
		Apellido as string,
		Segmento as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> extractData
extractData sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		idModo as integer,
		Desc as string,
		IdTipoEnvio as integer
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> store
